website_summaries.verdict: Not as versatile as some other container sets, but for consumers who like the unique features, the Milton set is a solid choice.
pros: Attractive for storing food right on the kitchen counter or table
cons: Containers are a little smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I purchased two sets to help my son and daughter in law organize the cupboards in their new home. I was able to consolidate and maximize the space beautifully. Okay, they are not the vacuum sealed Oxo style, but they close well and the price is right. Only drawback is that the largest of the containers won't hold a 5 lb bag of flour.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific organizing set!
customer_reviews.text: My cupboards look so organized now! I open the doors and just look at how wonderful they are. I ended up ordering 3 sets of these and still spent less than what it costs for one set of the OXO containers. The Milton containers are an excellent value and quality. They remind me of Tupperware at a much better price. You won't be disappointed if you order these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Eshleman

customer_reviews.title: Can't get the tops to fit on the container.
customer_reviews.text: I like these containers, they look great! BUT, I can't find the trick to attach the tops to the container. I have tried everything I know of, including stomping on them. There must be a trick. I have also heated the tops with hot water and that does nothing. What is the trick? I am used to Tupperware which has an easy on and off trick with burping the insides. But, that doesn't work here. I don't want to send them back. Help me someone? Update: the company wrote me that they are considering my problem and will get back to me. So far, nothing. If I don't hear in the next few days, these are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mindipin

customer_reviews.title: Small but great on space. A worthy buy.
customer_reviews.text: Air and water tight. Great units. Smaller than one would assume from the pictures. All the same, it took less space than the 3 cereal containers I tried before it, for all 10 of these. I'm not using a couple of the smaller ones. They might be good for a cut pickle in the lunch, baby carrots, or going cheap on chips for the kids, not much else. Little one snack foods maybe. I liked the larger ones enough that I may buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert From NY

customer_reviews.title: These containers are extremely difficult to close. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: These containers are extremely difficult to close. I have arthritis and I literally couldn't secure them closed. My boyfriend, who doesn't have joint pain, even struggled to secure the lids on but was able to eventually close them after excessive effort. Also, these containers were much smaller than I thought they would be. I intended to use them for storing sugar, flour and other baking products. The width on the product labels them as 3.5 inches wide and my 1 cup measure is 3 inches in diameter. However, when they arrived my measuring cup did not fit in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: These smaller cereal containers are just what I need. Quality of containers also seems good. I bought the 7-cup capacity 2-pack to store cereal in my fridge. I know that sounds odd, but my fridge is so big and my cabinet space so small. I will now buy another 2-pack same size. I like that they will go on fridge shelf standing upright and also that they are slightly narrower for my small hand grip. The container fit almost a full box of the family size Cheerios (I may have had one bowl out of box first). So size is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sangazure

customer_reviews.title: These are good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty thick material. Some say the lids are a bit hard to get on. That is true. The trick is that you have to get most of the lid on and then with 2 fingers press closed (just like seating a bicycle tire). Having it a bit hard to seal means it's air-tight. I bought the larger set a couple of years ago and so far they have held up very well. NOTE TO MANUFACTURER. The size selections you offer doesn't cover the need of smaller households. I would like more choices to order pieces/sizes. I am resistant to buying another "set" as they contain several large capacity containers that I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Airtight
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many different containers and liked how compact these containers would be. Living in a very humid area I need to stack a bunch of these in the cabinets to storage a variety of items. The smell others complained about was gone with a washing. My issue is the poor quality of the pouring lids. The connection of the top with two holes make the containers loose their airtightness. Also how it hinges will break quickly. Finally closing comes open easily. If you looking for quality, this would not be the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stackable, viewable storage!
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers! They made reorganizing my pantry SO much easier! They take up so much less room than other canisters I have used in the past while still allowing me to see what is in them and how much. Can't get,much better than that! (Maybe if there were bigger ones for say my flour)
customer_reviews.author: Reay Clan

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, Pour Lid does NOT Latch
customer_reviews.text: I love the product because it's the only cereal container that fits in my drawer, however, the pour lid does not stay shut. The blue is secure, but the clear latch that you open to pour out cereal does not latch close. Because of this, it is definitely not leak proof or airtight. Please correct the issue and you would have a stellar product!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBridein11

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I’m still figuring out what to store in these, but I like them. They’re good for storing dry ingredients. (I haven’t tried them for wet ingredients.). They have an easy access flip top for using a measuring spoon for something like Erythritol (a sugar alternative). They’re a good size to fit in my cabinets and can be stacked.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: STACKO food containers - perfect fit for pantry.
customer_reviews.text: The STACKO storage set is a great addition to our pantry. The flip tops makes it easy to pour out contents and the lid seals easily and tightly. I have not used them for liquids, therefore I do not know if they are leak proof. They are working perfectly for dry pantry foods and fit nicely on the pantry shelves.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult lids make these less than ideal
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these containers. I like how they stack, have interchangeable lids, and are transparent. However, the lids are very difficult to close which means that they can't be sent in school lunches. I find myself opting for other containers at home, too, just to avoid the annoyance of trying to wrangle the lid onto the container. I often find them in the pantry without the lids fully secured (which rather defeats the purpose). I have begun to phase these out of our pantry rotation.
customer_reviews.author: K Ford

customer_reviews.title: I love these BPA FREE containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these BPA FREE containers. They are great storage and I love the different size containers. Fit perfectly in my pantry and they are very resistant to freezer storage damage. Tops are great as well. They have flat covers, or parable covers for cereal, rice, sugar, whatever you use that you can store and pore from the same container. Great sizes as well. Well made and durable. Highly recommend if you have limited storage.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay, these are great! I really like the variety of sizes, and being able to stack them is a great space-saver. I filled a couple of them VERY full, and the white piece of the lid popped up a little. I'm not sure I would consider these truly air tight, but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love storage containers, but they are normally pricey. These are a great alternative and the price is even better! I use these for everything. I have not tried liquids in them, but dry foods are great! My nine year old loves helping in the kitchen even though she's clumsy and has dropped these a few times, they are still strong and sturdy! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Acrydia

customer_reviews.title: Tight Spaces Love these Containers
customer_reviews.text: The varied container sizes in this package are really nice. I'm using them to store dry pantry ingredients such as flours, seeds, nuts and grains. I have very short pantry spaces and even with stacking these containers fit in my space. They are easy to see into and label. They close and seal easily. This package actually contains 10 complete storage units (container and lid), not just 10 pieces (5 containers and 5 lids). I haven't been able to find anything comparable to these containers for the value.
customer_reviews.author: sjberrest

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, tho no mention of BPA free
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Christmas gift. Nice quality, tho no mention of BPA free, so there’s that for those who are concerned. The tops seem to be even better quality than the same shape of Tupperware containers I have had for 25 years. The only caveat is there on the smaller side, so I won’t be fitting any 5 pound bags of sugar in them.
customer_reviews.author: Family valley

customer_reviews.title: Their nice...
customer_reviews.text: These containers are sturdy, airtight, and ... smaller than I thought. The picture definitely makes it seem larger. The largest one is 6" across, 11" tall, and 2 1/2" wide. (Kinda small compared to my other ones) I would still recommend these though. They do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Artleigh Draws

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as my Tupperware ones and at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my home and in my camper. They are very nice and lids fit very tight so I don't worry that they will pop open in travels. They actually are the same size as my very old Tupperware ones I had so am happy to be able to combine them in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, you'll love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage containers. They're not the traditional size for your flour or sugar, but instead they're perfect for dried beans, rice, popcorn, egg noodles, and oyster crackers. The best part is that they easily fit on my upper cabinet lazy Susan, stacking on top of each other to save room. They're just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: csue

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. The fit is wonderful for stacking and clean up a cabinet. I'm using them as snack containers and they do keep food fresh. Thinking of buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: nee nee   erb

customer_reviews.title: Lids don't fit and smells bad
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. They have a really funky smell that did not go away despite dishwasher cleaning and the lids are super hard to get on the containers. The two flip top lids fit perfectly and go on easily, the rest? Not so much. They are super hard to do. Honestly, if I hadn't tossed the boxes, I would have sent these back. Go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Space saving storage
customer_reviews.text: These storage containers are y'all and narrow, which makes for efficient use of space. Good quality--definitely a step up from the Ziploc containers I was using. They seal well and some of them come with optional pour/measure lids. And they have a fun name: Stacko!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and style of the lid but it doesn’t seem to keep my snacks as fresh as I’d like for very long. Maybe it’s just a coincidence though because sometimes they work fine?
customer_reviews.author: MrsN

customer_reviews.title: Works for me :-)
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have pantry containers that are airtight and stackable. The lids are all the same size. There are 5 different sizes. Four of the 10 containers will not fit on the top rack of the dishwasher so they need to be hand washed.
customer_reviews.author: Matrix Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price ($35)
customer_reviews.text: Lids are VERY hard to get on. If I had issues with my hand, I wouldn't have been able to put them on. Ok sizes. Good for the price ($35)
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the lid?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, all items did not arrive unblemished. The largest container's lid has several cracks in it. Yes I do have 2 extra lids for pouring, I do not have a regular lid for full airtight closure. I did not want to return the whole box for 1 broken lid, but a replacement lid would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannett

customer_reviews.title: I use these for baking supplies and so far no ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for baking supplies and so far no leaks or clumps in my sugar from air from the moisture! They have proven to be freezer and microwave safe so far, but I have been washing them by hand despite the indication that it is dishwasher safe. Sometimes it is a little hard to get the lid on the container but it does eventually go on and then it stays on without fear of it popping off if you squeeze the container (which you can't do because it's a very hard plastic). I would say this was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen Wa

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been just okay. Several of them want to have the plastic dispenser cover pop off when you try to open it to poor something. It gets very annoying. The lids fit well on the containers but I wouldn't call it truly air tight. I would still really like them if the stupid dispenser covers would stop popping off.
customer_reviews.author: 2014hpayton

customer_reviews.title: They smell so bad it burns my eyes and nostrils
customer_reviews.text: They smell so bad it burns my eyes and nostrils. I’ve washed them several times. It appears the smell is coming from the lids. You can smell them with the cupboard closed. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: They smelled strongly when I first got them so I had to wash them before using. Some tops had melted slightly in the dish washer and the others simply didn’t fit onto the canisters. Completely unable to use these and also unable to return because I had unwrapped all of them and washed them. Sad wasted plastic and money :(
customer_reviews.author: Atrina B.

customer_reviews.title: STACKO Food Storage Containers is a two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I am quite content with these food storage containers. They are PP and safer than other materials. They have help me get organized in the kitchen and I am thinking of obtaining another series in the future. I have used it for storing a sundry of legumes and because they are visible, I need not worry about labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Nili

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Tallest holds spaghetti or lasagne noodles.
customer_reviews.text: The clear plastic pouring lid snaps off the blue lid for easy cleaning. I don't know if they are leak proof or not. The tallest one has plenty of room for spaghetti or lasagne noodles. The smallest ones are a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Psyohe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect container set!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great container set for all of my boxed food items to organize in my pantry and this is perfect. They're well made and washed great in the dishwasher. I put the lids on the top rack and no issues. I love that all of the lids fit on any of the size containers to make it easy.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing your baking supplies.
customer_reviews.text: These were great to organize my flour, sugar, , powdered sugar, brown sugar, baking soda, bread flour, oatmeal, malt-o meal, etc. I love the easy pour spouts, too.
customer_reviews.author: B7827

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I love all the different sizes
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love all the different sizes. I was able to get my pantry looking much better. They are a little on the smaller side, but they worked perfect for condensing a lot of random boxes I had.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Phelps

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, all I can say to start is... everyone needs these containers for Dry Food Stores. This has been my 2nd order and I believe there will be a 3rd or 4th order coming. Guess you can figure, I'm one very happy customer. Take note; they're made in India, not China, huh!?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Make Sure The Dimensions Are Worth It For You.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but still great. Make sure you really check the dimensions of each before deciding to purchase. It's only clear from the sides, the other two sides have that typical "fog" look, where it's not that clear. That's why the one star off. Well built. Price is worth it. Lids stay on very well.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews Before Dues

customer_reviews.title: Storage container set
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy plastic, lids shut easy and are tight. I live in Florida, and ants are a terrible problem, getting into food stored in the box from the store. I just wish the set came with more of the larger size containers, as the small ones are not quite large enough for most of the items I need to save. But it is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight. Lids loose and fall off.
customer_reviews.text: Not air tight! It is a shame. These look nice, and the bottoms are well made, but the seals do not close air tight. If that's not a problem for you, go for it, but I'm looking for something that will keep flours and grains FRESH, and these won't do. Some of the lids actually didn't fit well and slipped right off. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s my own fault for not thinking the detentions though when buying these. The bigger ones can only hold about half of what’s in a standard box of cereal. I should have bought bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Genard

customer_reviews.title: Great storage boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these storage containers for someone else, but they appeared to be well-made. The tops sealed well and left little doubt that they would perform well.
customer_reviews.author: JA Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I like the containers very much they stack in the refrigerator nicely. Since I am entering a wheat free diet stage the mix could be better in the starter set had more of the two largest ones and only two of the smallest. Two pounds of nut meal takes the largest container.
customer_reviews.author: R E Rockey

customer_reviews.title: These air tight containers are perfect for protecting your pantry dry goods from these insects
customer_reviews.text: I recently inherited a pantry moth issue from the prior tenant. These air tight containers are perfect for protecting your pantry dry goods from these insects. I tested them by placing water in them, putting on the lid, and inverting them to see if any water leaked out. None did. I bought one set to try out. Then, ordered a second set. They really optimize the space in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I just strengthened up the first row in my pantry and I’m super excited! It went from chaos to tidy in the matter of minutes! The sizes are great! The small ones hold a whole bag of chocolate chips. The size just up from that held a bag of coconut, the medium held a 3 pound bag of rice and the large one held a bag of mini marshmallows with room to spare! Looks great and I can see everything clearly through the containers! Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rice

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store dry cereal. No pour spout but I wanted airtight containers. Good size, not oversized, so they will fit in my cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNINE A ABBOTT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We needed to organize our pantry. It's rather small and it was difficult to find things without moving everything around. The stacko's allowed us to organize the shelves so we could see exactly what was where. Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Defibblues

customer_reviews.title: Serve the purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Thay are very nice good looking containers. Milton is a good brand but sometimes the kid doesn't fit well on the container and it becomes difficult to close it. But for the money they serve the purpose well
customer_reviews.author: Harshi & Abi

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect. Getting an extra set for my home kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed knew they had to stack neatly. There are so many different (and efficient) configurations you can do. And they gave two extra lids. Who does that?!! Genius! We used these inside our RV trailer, sticking them in all the nooks and crannies. These were perfect. Getting an extra set for my home kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn S Rohrhofer-Kawash

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The variety of sizes was nice and I was able to find purposes for all of them in my pantry
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha D Lopez

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! I have already ordered three additional small containers ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I have already ordered three additional small containers and will be ordering another full set. I love that the lid also has a clear panel to see the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not as practical as it could be
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality... but it the sizes are not big enough. Forget storing any but the smallest cereal sizes in even the biggest one... which they only give you one of. Worst of all, they only give you two of the flip lids :(
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Okay does the job
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and for the money they are good, and do the job. Like other reviews the clear plastic flap on the top does not stay on when you open to pour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm, just realized mine was suppose to come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm, just realized mine was suppose to come with 2 pouring lids....it did Not. All was sealed in plastic except for one of the containers....so maybe someone opened it....otherwise product good
customer_reviews.author: jenifa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I am using these containers for several different items. I have cereal in the tallest, pastas in some of the medium height ones. Crackers, cookies, rice, in other ones. Seals nicely and easily. Not hard to remove the lid or open the spout. I have not experienced food going stale in the containers. I love the slim design as it makes them store nice and neat in my small cabinet space
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Before and After
customer_reviews.text: These containers were a gift for a friend. She loves them, and sent a before and after picture to show me how they helped her organize her kitchen shelf. Good buy for the money....and they look good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage containers. They fit perfectly in my cabinet and the different sizes made for easy storing.
customer_reviews.author: Tylynn Puller

customer_reviews.title: These containers do their job and they do it well ...
customer_reviews.text: These containers do their job and they do it well. I do wish they were bigger and that it had more than one large container out of the ten items.
customer_reviews.author: Fayola

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best containers out there, they are sleek space savers, right sizes and the for the price its a bargain. I love these, wish they had them in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Irving123

customer_reviews.title: Great stackable storage but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for storage and organization of pantry. They were smaller than I expected but I found plenty of items that I could store; i.e. pasta shells, nuts, raisins, candy, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Good Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I love that they're stackable and they are constructed well.
customer_reviews.author: kkeefe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for organizing kitchen cupboards
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using these to organize our kitchen cupboards. Nice, stackable design, much better than odds and ends crammed in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, poor sizing.
customer_reviews.text: 10 piece set - sizing is extremely disappointing. the large container - 3 qts doesn't even hold 2 boxes of rotini pasta. i wouldn't call these airtight either, the pour tops hinder that. i do like the pour tops. just wish the sizing would be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: julie ann

customer_reviews.title: Neatly organizes many pantry items.
customer_reviews.text: Those containers seem durable and the lids fit well. They are very similar to a set of Tupperware containers I bought many years ago. I love the narrow shape and how well they fit on the pantry shelf. I also like the pourable lids. I wish there were more than 2 included with the order. I’d also like a couple that are taller than the rest. I don’t have much use for the shortest ones.
customer_reviews.author: denise jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a space waster!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are straight and do not waste space in my cupboards. The lids do lockdown tight, although I only use then for dry goods, not wet.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage for little price
customer_reviews.text: Replacing many odd storage units for these wonderful stacking ones which fit my cabinet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: spurs

customer_reviews.title: food containers
customer_reviews.text: amazing containers. i order 2 sets of the 10. i have very small kitchen cabinets so these fits perfect . for small stuff these are great. these are not for flour or big cereals.
customer_reviews.author: jackie orozcoTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering getting the Rubbermaid modular storage containers, but then I read reviews for this product. The quality of this set is great, there are a lot more pieces than what you get with other brands, and you can't beat the price. I got 2 sets for my pantry, and I'm glad I did. Not only have these helped me organize the pantry, they have saved a ton of space. My mother-in-law saw these while she was in town and really liked them, so I bought a set for her. You can't go wrong with these containers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids are too tight
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like these containers. The design is great, shape and size are perfect. The only problem is the lids will not go on all the small containers without a real fight. The large and medium containers are fine, it's just the small ones. I've even tried swapping lids to see if it was just a problem with the lid. At the end of the day it's probably not worth returning them, because the larger ones work fine. But I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mach

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: The containers are wonderful and take up little room on the countertop freeing up cabinet space!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Matejka

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the name brand
customer_reviews.text: I typically only buy, err thrift, another popular brands of these but thought I'd try these. I was skeptical if they would stack well with the tupperware I already own. They do! They stack well and are nearly identical in size which makes the modular part of both stacko and tupperware work seamlessly. The lids of both brands are also interchangeable but not quite as tight fitting. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because I wish these came in the super oval/cupboard depth that tupperware does.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Very neat and tidy and great price
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and ease of this product. No complaints! It gives microwave instructions (without lid) but no dishwasher institutions anywhere. I took a chance and dishwasher was fine
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: These were so nicely made. They will make nice storage for my dry goods
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are great for storage although I'm not sure how airtight they are.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bentley

customer_reviews.title: good clear set, covers seal well
customer_reviews.text: Onewas slightly cracked but then it was delivered the week we had sub zero weather.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA G.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I live alone so a lot of dry goods go stale before I can eat them. These containers are perfect. They fit in my cupboards well.
customer_reviews.author: Paris A.

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: Work well, lids are tight. only complaint..... too many small containers in set. The largest container will NOT hold a full box of cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Ronrizz

customer_reviews.title: very helpful for storage
customer_reviews.text: The stackable food storage container set is helpful for maximizing cupboard space and providing multiple items will fit together in small spaces. By removing cardboard boxes that products are sold in provides extra space. Keeping food items airtight is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McBurney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boxes
customer_reviews.text: Clips on and off easy and looks great as well. Good buy for any kitchen
customer_reviews.author: M.prime

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: They are not as good as I was hoping and I seldom use them. Took multiple washes to loose the plastic smell, and visually they look poor compared to XOXO containers. I use these for food storage but not ever in plain sight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like my old Tupperware set I was replacing after 20 years for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Shea

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described; we love it. The containers stack well in the size-limited storage bins on our boat, and the lids seal properly. An added convenience is that the lids are all the same size. We will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: MountainViewDoug

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small pantry
customer_reviews.text: I love these organizing storage containers. Being stackable, they didn't take up much room in my small pantry. Everything looks so neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: thedrams5

customer_reviews.title: These worked great. They fit on the shelves of our not-so-deep ...
customer_reviews.text: Started a vegan diet and needed containers for dry beans & grains. These worked great. They fit on the shelves of our not-so-deep cabinets too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenilee L.

customer_reviews.title: Great lifs
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for my purpose and the lids are tight fitting
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stach

customer_reviews.title: Stako storage containers work well
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? They are easy to clean and stack
customer_reviews.author: Retired engineer

customer_reviews.title: Would like more of the medium sized containers
customer_reviews.text: Fits well with my existing Tupperware containers. Would like more of the medium sized containers. Too many small containers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was smaller than I expected. I should have ...
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I expected. I should have paid closer attention to sizes. Well made and well packaged though.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ringgold

customer_reviews.title: stackable
customer_reviews.text: these are very sharp looking and easy to stack in the cabinets. once you label them there is no question what you are getting out of the cabinet of shelf. Being able to see thru them is a big plus.....
customer_reviews.author: t. boy

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure glad I tried these out and then bought 2 more ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled finding containers to keep all my electrical parts in. The containers they come packaged in is usually thin walled and breaks apart while riding in my service truck. I’m sure glad I tried these out and then bought 2 more sets. They stack nicely in my truck bins and easy to see what’s in them without having to label or pull lids off. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara F.

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice containers. Easy to snap the lids into place after filling.
customer_reviews.author: Lahree

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this product because in the picture, it looks like a container can hold a box of cereal, but even the largest container does not. I wanted to return the product but it does not have free returns. Yes, these items were both my responsibility to figure out before I ordered them, that is why I will give 3 stars since the product is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Countertop space
customer_reviews.text: These containers fit perfectly on my countertop and I have more room
customer_reviews.author: Connie Greene-Flintall

customer_reviews.title: Great Pantry Storage/Organization
customer_reviews.text: These are great containers for storing a variety of items in the pantry. Love that they stack neatly to save room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very small and very over priced I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Tobyluv

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these for others - be aware of the sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little containers for the pantry. I would caution to just be aware of the size/capacity of these containers. They were smaller than I was expecting them to be.
customer_reviews.author: jlmuszyn

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than wanted
customer_reviews.text: Although my wife likes the containers, I was hoping for a taller set. Your writeup gave little info on size and capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Real Kool

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set. Only set back is the weird smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set. Only set back is the weird smell of plastic left in them.
customer_reviews.author: Shi Shi san

customer_reviews.title: space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love that these can stack in many different combos, I purchased these to keep in my rv pantry and they work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Shick
